version_description:
* Tip: You can press and drag a celestial body to move it.
- Fixes issues of user tutorial loop
- Interstellar Space has been redesigned

* Tip: You can press and drag a celestial body to move it.
- Fixes issues of user tutorial loop
- Interstellar Space has been redesigned

We are continuously improving the app:
- A 'Clear All' button has been added to the '-' menu.
- Performance has been optimized for all devices.
- Graphics has been improved.
- A new sound has been added to the Galaxy view.
- Gyroscope performance has been improved.

We are continuously improving the app:
- A 'Clear All' button has been added to the '-' menu.
- Performance has been optimized for all devices.
- Graphics has been improved.
- A new sound has been added to the Galaxy view.
- Gyroscope performance has been improved.

- Fixed a problem causing the camera to spin in wrong direction.
- Fixed a problem in SpaceNet.
- Improved the clarity of the color rendering.

- Fixed a problem causing the camera to spin in wrong direction.
- Fixed a problem in SpaceNet.
- Improved the clarity of the color rendering.

The Best of 2016 app SPACE now comes to iPhone.
- Create your own universe at your fingertips.
- Play with celestial objects in your palm.
- And learn Physics anytime, anywhere.

The Best of 2016 app SPACE now comes to iPhone.
- Create your own universe at your fingertips.
- Play with celestial objects in your palm.
- And learn Physics anytime, anywhere.

- Play with celestial objects in your palm.

The Best of 2016 app SPACE now comes to iPhone.
- Create your own universe at your fingertips.
- Play with celestial objects in your palm.
- And learn Physics anytime, anywhere.

- Added Habitable feature for planets - Create some habitable planets and wait for life to inhabit soon in the next update!
- Improved the SpaceNet connection stability.

- Added Habitable feature for planets - Create some habitable planets and wait for life to inhabit soon in the next update!
- Improved the SpaceNet connection stability.

- iPhone X Support
- Minor bug fixes

- iPhone X Support
- Minor bug fixes

- 3D engine has been holistically improved for better textures and rendering
- added Habitable\Life\Intelligent Life feature to planets, try incubate lives on your planets!
- fixed black hole texture bug
- now it's easier to create satellites around a planet with the aid of Gravity line

- 3D engine has been holistically improved for better textures and rendering
- added Habitable\Life\Intelligent Life feature to planets, try incubate lives on your planets!
- fixed black hole texture bug
- now it's easier to create satellites around a planet with the aid of Gravity line
